lender.name: Pim
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help. Lender and loaner are on an equal base.
lender.occupational_info: I am editor of the instructions that are needed by the people who execute the social securities in my country

lender.name: Ruth/Abby
lender.loan_because: It's an excellent way to help others achieve their livelihood/happiness/dreams, and to remind me of the kindness my sister had throughout her life.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to make sure that I and the institution I work for positively impact the environment, and that we leave places & people better off than when we first encountered them.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who have the will to change their life for the better.

lender.name: antonella
lender.loan_because: feeling useful for someone helps giving a sense to life. And also it is great to have a contact with people all over the world

lender.name: Ian & Nhien
lender.occupation: Ian - Carer for People with Disabilities

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to someone directly.
lender.occupational_info: Maintaining computerised building control systems.

lender.name: Fasttranslator
lender.loan_because: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it. John D. Rockefeller
lender.occupational_info: CEO of translation and localization agency

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to a better world for those who need it, want it, and are willing to show initiative, entrepreneurial spirit and drive, and could use a bit of financial support to make it all happen...

lender.name: Henk
lender.loan_because: I believe that many small efforts can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I see to it that computersystems are built to make our work easier.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: It is simply a gesture that can make the difference...
lender.occupational_info: Managing a financial department

lender.name: Rebecca Chang
lender.loan_because: Unconditional giving brings blessings in the world
lender.occupational_info: A happy mind attracts good fortune.

lender.name: serge
lender.loan_because: because i am amazed that such small loans can make such a difference

lender.name: sreenivas
lender.loan_because: FOR MY EXPANSION OF MY BUSNIESS AND FOR NEW WORKS

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Every little bit we do is significant.

lender.name: dilip
lender.loan_because: service of mankind is the best of god

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: Every idea that people have to better their lives and/or community needs a chance.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: As an economist I know the power and the effectiveness of micro-financing and appreciate this opportunity to be a small part of this exciting program.
lender.occupational_info: My research focuses on poverty issues in the US, particularly the connection between education and poverty. I direct a program that works with the local school system to provide low income students the opportunity to do service-learning to address poverty issues in the community. We also work on the issue of student drop-outs.

lender.name: Margareta
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the microfinancing success stories begun by Mr. Yunus and help women manage their lives and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in languages and the culture of other peoples.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I can't afford much, but I want to do what I can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers when they break and teach my customers how to take care of their machines in the future.

lender.name: Noreen
lender.occupation: Office manager for non profit arts organization
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lender.name: AMINGO
lender.loan_because: I belive everyone
lender.occupational_info: hope everyone happy in everything

lender.name: Nicodeme
lender.loan_because: it is rewarding to see so little help can make such a difference in the life of so many.
lender.occupational_info: as a work of a good Samaritan

lender.name: mario
lender.loan_because: help people

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. I am particularly interested in helping women business owners and women farmers.
lender.occupational_info: I work for agencies that work to help people. I help these agencies with communications activities and community involvement. I also try to help local women that I work with, especially women, to build their capacities as communicators and managers.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: it is a sustainable alternative to foreign aid. Microfinance really makes a difference in people's life and that's what's important!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: these funds are going straight to the grassroots and not into corporate administrational costs (gone crazy) that are so detrimental to business survival. Its time for all of us to give a little. Everyone has a god given gift if given the chance.
lender.occupational_info: A business mentor

lender.name: AmericanAbroad
lender.loan_because: The Internet should also make a difference for those who cannot afford computers. All of us on this planet are connected.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I support micro credits!
lender.occupational_info: Educative as a volunteer

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: each little bit helps.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It shows the true love many Americans have for people in others countries. I enjoy helping other people help themselves. I have been truly blessed by this experience.

lender.name: Kennesaw Sociology
lender.loan_because: a small loan will go a long way in creating a better world.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher, I try to show students the importance of the sociological imagination in understanding their relationship to the social, cultural, political, spiritual aspects of the global village. Students relate the sociological approach to their lifelong learning.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I can take and make business opportunities work. And I want everyone else to have this too!!!

lender.name: Wright Family
lender.loan_because: we believe that fostering entrepreneurship is one of the most effective ways to reduce poverty and all the ills that receive support from proverty. We loan because it works!

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: the return on this investment is priceless... a brillant concept and super fun.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies develop and implement corporate real estate strategies.

lender.name: Terrie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: john w.
lender.loan_because: Where a few dollars can make a significant difference

lender.name: Susette
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Design and develop computer applications for government and business.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I lend because I know that small loans can make a big difference in a person's life, benefitting them and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I write about people in developing countries.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am convinced it is the best way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large buildings for owners and users of buildings

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I once needed financial assistance and was lucky enough to get the help I needed. I hope my support will benefit other business people.

lender.name: Cristi
lender.loan_because: I can. And because as a returned Peace Corps Volunteer (Guinea, West Africa) I know how much of a difference a small loan can make in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Educating the world's future and hoping that they will care enough to use their gifts to make the world a better place for everyone.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: i've been more fortunate than i deserve to be.
lender.occupational_info: i write software.

lender.name: Cis
lender.occupation: Teacher of conta dance and tai chi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are making an effort to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have two professions, but in both I teach people to move. With tai chi, I teach movements that increase flexibility, balance, focus, and general well-being. With contra dance, I teach people to enjoy music, themselves, and each other in a fun, welcoming, community environment.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I think microcredit is a good idea that's proven effective and am happy to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the telephone company telling machines what to do.

lender.name: Billsen
lender.loan_because: I need all the good Karma I can get - I work in marketing! I tip my cap to these fine people who are doing what they can to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing is my expertise; Atlanta Thrashers Hockey and Music are my passions!

lender.name: Van Nguyen
lender.loan_because: I can. Helping others makes life more meaningful for me.

lender.name: Freeland Family
lender.loan_because: People need opportunity to suceed. We also want our children to know that there is a broader world out there and that they can interact with it in a positive way.

lender.name: Lee and Olga
lender.loan_because: I can. God has blessed us tremendously and we are told in the Bible to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: I have plenty of American liberal guilt, and a little bit of extra cash.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people and things, mostly for advertising.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed in my life and I am glad I can help!

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: it helps others to help themselves.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to do what litt;e I can to improve our world by helping others who need help.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: We have more than we need.

lender.name: PrescottCawlfield.com
lender.loan_because: With Kiva we finally feel like we can truly make a difference in the world. We look at our loans as investments with a high rate of return, empowerment.

lender.name: Leonard and Christine
lender.loan_because: We believe that everyone should have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: We both teach college students. We love our work because we believe we can make a difference.

lender.name: Janiece
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in life and in a small way provide some of the means towards their honorable endeavors.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Every person on this planet deserves the opportunity to make a better life for him or herself and for their family. A lack of necessary funding, particular in a capitalist world that wastes so much, is criminal. If you have a dream and you are willing to work hard, life should reward you. There is absolutely no shortage of a work ethic in the third world. Since the wealth of the USA has been built on the resources of the third world, seems like its only fair that we make a contribution, that we aid our brothers and sisters who haven't had it as easy as we have. Besides, they've got some great ideas!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 16, 17, 18 year olds Government and World Issues in a public high school in Muskegon, Michigan in the United States.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: There is a need....And I feel like I can be an entrepreneur as these folks are....
lender.occupational_info: I work in the aviation industry as an aircraft mechanic, which connects people to the world....

lender.name: Foundation Wereldwijs
lender.loan_because: we support educational projects and we want a make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small foundation, founded in 1993 by a few friends.

lender.name: Merrie Lee
lender.loan_because: The Nobel Peace prize winner articles last year inspired me, as I thought it was a very good idea. I would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I spend a lot of time on the computer and at the sewing machine and reading books.

lender.name: KuÃ©
lender.occupation: Agent de Technicien en Agriculture Et Elevage.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's important for people to earn their own way so they can have pride in themselves. It's better to give them a boost toward independence rather than just keeping them dependent on others.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a computer geek and auditor. Now I'm retired.

lender.name: Dahlia
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a loan at some point in their life.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help. I want to make a difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to understand and cope with the thoughts and feelings that come after the death of someone loved.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I can?

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can't think of any better way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I taught Latin and Greek poetry.

lender.name: Jeanny
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to establish my own business as a coach and know how hard it is to get a business going. I lend through Kiva because I believe that people who want to make better lives for themselves and their families should have that opportunity. I loan because I believe in empowering women.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them discover what they want to achieve; how to find the passion, skill and talent inside themselves to achieve it; and then set a plan in motion to make it all happen for them.

lender.name: Lauren Leigh
lender.loan_because: A lot of my work is still theoretical. Micro-loans are one way I can help make a real difference now.
lender.occupational_info: I'm presently doing research on the relationship between political culture and democracy in developing states, particularly Madagascar.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It may sound funny, but i just want to be the best person I can be. This seems like an amazing opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies looking to extend their businesses or add a demension to it. I help them communicate with the local community and try to help ensure that everything that is done, is done for the common good.

lender.name: Percy & Kara
lender.loan_because: "Broad, wholesome, charitable views cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth." -- Twain

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I care about those who have very little & I want to help them start their own business and become self supporting!
lender.occupational_info: I work for several organizations dealing with poverty & famine. I am extremely dedicated & believe that we all can make a difference, one person at a time!

lender.name: Gaye
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Mick Flanigan
lender.loan_because: I believe capitalism works, and Kiva exposes countries and entrepreneurs to opportunites that wouldn't have existed. Additionally, it's great hearing the success stories and seeing that you helped - even if it is just a bit...
lender.occupational_info: I help companies and clients realize the potential of their existing information and optimize their operations.

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed; I am a breast cancer survivor and wife and mother. Others have helped me in the past and it feels wonderful to be in a position to help someone now.
lender.occupational_info: I correct errors in writers' work and also suggest ways to improve it.

lender.name: Grandma Dar
lender.loan_because: I think everyone needs a leg up sometimes
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired chemist, I'm an elected city council member, a school volunteer, and a voluteer at a resettlemnt house for immigrants and refugees

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I guarantee they need it more than I do.

lender.name: MATTHEW
lender.loan_because: It gives people a chance at loans that they would not normally get.Keeps familys together by providing abetter life for them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the goverment at a radioactive cleanup site. I make sure people don't get exposed or contaminated with radation.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I used to own a business. Now I just make sure things are working. As they are are suppose to.
lender.occupational_info: Work is a F-O-U-R letter word.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: I think KIVA is a wonderful initiative and I can think of no better way to spend my savings.

lender.name: Margret
lender.loan_because: Women and farmers helping one another.
lender.occupational_info: Animal breeding and sales.

lender.name: Wendy N
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and sell and rent housing to people.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others have opportunities to take care of themselves and their families.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I like having a connection to businesses around the world and I believe microfinance, when done right, is part of a long-term solution to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm am continuing my journey as a Kiva Fellow. After 3 months working with Kiva's field partner CEPRODEL in Nicaragua, and 3 months in Costa Rica with Kiva's field partner FundaciÃ³n Mujer, I am now working in the Bay Area as a Kiva Fellow at Opportunity Fund and in Kiva HQ

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to help people. By far the best method of helping deserving less fortunate people.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others through volunteer work and whatever money I am able to give.
lender.occupational_info: I was an IT Manager for a large international law firm and my work included directing the 35 IT technicians in installing and supporting computer systems and training attorneys and support staff for the firm's domestic and international offices.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: This couldn't be more simple. If everyone would just donate a little, a lot could be accomplished. People just need a helping hand.....

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I find planning and developing a business exciting, and I want to help other people who feel the same way start and grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses learn how to grow bigger.

lender.name: Courtenay
lender.loan_because: it is wonderful to be able to help individuals across the world make a better life for themselves and their families, because it is exciting to learn about their lives and because building connections across the globe helps foster peace!
lender.occupational_info: Courtenay is a Software Engineer working at The Joxel Group in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I am very impressed with the industriousness and initiative of the business people applying for loans. Microfinance builds prosperity by capitalizing on these amazing personal resources.
lender.occupational_info: I study topics around math, optimization and computer science.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: To help the working poor become more successful and lead a more comfortable life in a difficult surroundings
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help ensure that every Canadian businessperson has a Treo Smartphone to make how they live and play easier and more enjoyable. www.palm.com/treo

lender.name: Peace x Peace Laguna Beach
lender.loan_because: we wish to connect to the world and spread peace to other women through helping them to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: We are a circle of 11 women who have fortunate lives. We meet every month to discuss our work, large and small, in our mission to create peace in and outside our selves.

lender.name: Tareq
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way of empowering people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a first-year college student at an excellent school. My focus in school is on Human Biology, Health & Society with a concentration in Global Health. I hope to be a doctor one day

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: All people need resources to grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work with local charities helping them to grow and be successful.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupation: I work for an accounting firm.
lender.loan_because: I like the personal connection and I really believe this makes a difference.

lender.name: Daniel Nyboe
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving all humans a chance to prosper. Trying to make business in poor countries is hard and I admire those who doesnÂ´t give up and/or leave choose to stay where they are helping their families and their country to evolve.
lender.occupational_info: IÂ´m one of 31 members of the city council in Aalborg, Denmark (approx 200.000 citizens).

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: i feel it can make a real impact you don't just loan money you help build dreams

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: I live in New York City and sometimes feel very removed from the rest of the planet.
lender.occupational_info: My job: I book media for authors--so tv, radio, newspapers, magazines. The authors are interesting and passionate about their work and I enjoying working with books.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together. Helping others helps us all.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to believe in themselves.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It seems like a neat idea.
lender.occupational_info: I take x-rays

lender.name: Three Municipal Mayors
lender.occupational_info: We are Mayors of three municipalities in Yukon, Canada. Bev Buckway-Whitehorse, Michelle Vainio-Faro, John Steins-Dawson City

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I wanted this person to be able to have a successful life and be happy with his family. I didn't want him to struggle and be without food.

lender.name: Barry Milyovsky
lender.loan_because: Tradition!
lender.occupational_info: I wander about. I have a camera. I take pictures.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: "Don't curse the darkness, light a candle". I've been very fortunate in my life, I have an obligation to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I knit/sew/create with yarn and fabric clothing and household accessories.

lender.name: Ami LaRoche
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a level playing field. I want everyone to have the opportunity to support themselves, their families, and their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I help do immunology research at a hospital for children.

lender.name: Christopher and Alexis
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have the quality of life that they are working towards.
lender.occupational_info: I respond to calls for help in my city and enforce laws.

lender.name: Kelly & Kids
lender.loan_because: What a great opportunity to feel like we can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: My children and I homeschool together---taking opportunities to use the community and world as our classroom.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: this is a great idea to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: i am a doctor and treat people who have chronic pain

lender.name: jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It just feels right.

lender.name: Rodney & Tina
lender.loan_because: We loan b/c we are blessed and have an attitude of gratitude. So little from us, so much for them.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I design office buildings, houses and stores here in Miami, Florida USA.

lender.name: Katelin
lender.loan_because: I'm hoping to 'be the change'.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student studying to be a family doctor.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and the free enterprise system
lender.occupational_info: I retired from a large US insurance company.

lender.name: Mike H.
lender.loan_because: It makes a better me.I think the best thing for all people is self help honest work and education.If the situitation were reversed I think these people would lend to me. All my loans are made in a non religious,non political,and non profit way.

lender.name: Daryl & Kathy
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so and I hope I can make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: My heart is in bird photography. I am a tax accountant in real life, however. It's the accounting that pays for the bird photography. Most times, you have to pay the bills first and follow your passion after that. That's me.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance empowers entrepreneurs in developing countries (as well as developed ones)
lender.occupational_info: Having spent the past couple of years working in finance, I am excited to volunteer as a Kiva Fellow (KF12) and see how microfinance works first-hand.

lender.name: Jacob Fyda
lender.loan_because: Most children who don't attend school cannot afford the uniform required by schools or their parents need them to work around the family farm/business. Most deaths are from preventable diseases. Most impoverished farmers cannot support their family because there are not sufficient roads to transport goods. One solution to the underlying problems is economic development. Micro-financing loans are a small part of a conscious effort to promote small business and help eradicate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: So many people have potential life, yet, that potential is hardly ever let thrive. In this case, we're presented with numerous individuals who have that very same potential. It's potential business initiatives that can provide for a better future for those surrounding them.

lender.name: debbie
lender.loan_because: I have enough to eat, a clean warm place to sleep, and so do my children. I have been blessed. I want the same for everyone, everywhere, and it is possible if we all give from our hearts.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital that takes care of people, even if they do not have much money.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: It's one of the best way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Macroeconomics at a University in Louisiana USA

lender.name: Hodge
lender.loan_because: It's a small but good way to help realize the ideal of "free minds and free markets."
lender.occupational_info: My firm helps organizations get the right people in the right jobs and helps people reach their potential on the job.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It helps me sleep a little bit better at night.
lender.occupational_info: It's like every day is Friday.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I like empowering people to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info:
I run a preschool for children ages 3-5 in a Jewish Community Center.
I am also an expecting Mother.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent program - I especially like that it is not a give away program. It allows the lender to feel a sense of pride in ownership.
lender.occupational_info: I own apartment rentals.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I'm planning to loan in honour and memory of my grandfather, James McKelvie, who sits beside me in this last photo we took together. He never judged anyone no matter what their circumstances and offered his help to whoever needed it. When he worked as a railway station master, he was very kind to the homeless who made the station their refuge. At the end of each day, despite being told not to, he would find a way to leave sandwiches from the diner out for them. I'm inspired by his warmth and generosity and want to carry the best of him forward in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing and public relations, and I help companies build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders through effective communications practices.

lender.name: Annamarie
lender.loan_because: Thanks to the Kiva organization,my small contributions can help make a difference to others all over the world. I believe in Kiva's philosophy and am very pleased to be able to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently retired but I taught primary age children in public school. I also worked as school library/media specialist. Since my retirement I have volunteered for several non-profit organizations and I take an interest in my community.

lender.name: coyote
lender.loan_because: it is quite simply the right thing to do. I owe my brothers and sisters at least this much.
lender.occupational_info: I reveal the past to the present in hopes of altering the future.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: More than a handout, a loan to start a business is a true way to help someone help themselves and their families. I have travelled throughout South America, Africa and Asia and was extremely impacted by the people I met.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I write romance novels.

lender.name: Kent & Patty
lender.loan_because: As small business people ourselves, we understand that entrepreneurs may need money to finance a start-up or to grow their businesses, and that it can be difficult to borrow money from a bank.
lender.occupational_info: Kent publishes nonfiction books about Alaska. Patty operates a nursery school for children ages 3-5.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I believe that all people are fundamentally good and strive to be the best they can be given the right set of circumstances. Despite our ethnic, cultural, or socio-economic differences, I think as humans we are more alike than we are different.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer and editor of elementary educational curriculum for major publishing companies in the United States. I enjoy the fact that I can use the power of words to enrich a child's life. klowther@austin.rr.com

lender.name: Kaj
lender.loan_because: Because it's nice and to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old, so mostly I'm a student (in Japan). I like drawing comics and playing basketball.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have been given with other people who have amazing dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with at-risk youth to help them reach their full potential and maximum joy.

lender.name: Rrain
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: DENISE
lender.loan_because: It is important for me that my money is going to the people and causes I intend and not being lost in some big box charity.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very good way to give people a better chance in life, and help them build up a future for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: we do all sorts of agicultural work, ploughing, drilling, harvesting grain, potatoes, carrots, and like farmers all over he world we go along with the seasons and we are dependant on the weather.

lender.name: Sunder Kennady
lender.loan_because: I wanted to do the best to overcome poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I handle passenger in the international airport.

lender.name: Guillermo
lender.loan_because: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.

lender.name: Hugh Dow
lender.loan_because: Because I like to see businesses working and I admire entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I run a business which helps office workers get more done with less effort.

lender.name: Jaynieeee
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way

lender.name: Wee Cheng
lender.loan_because: I believe in a more equalitarian world where everyone is given the same opportunities to work hard and improve their lives. Whilst some of us live in societies where developed capital and credit markets can assist the man-on-the-street to realise his dreams, there are many who simply do not have access to such opportunities. Kiva provides a platform to bridge this gap, and perhaps we can all contribute to this aim.
lender.occupational_info: I measure and count beans planted and sold in one country, and then informed investors who live in another country about the findings, in the hope that more people round the world will invest in planting more beans in the first country.

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: when people from around the world come together it has a big inpack

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: I schedule, supervise and inspect the construction of new homes in Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA.

lender.name: Dante & Sebastien
lender.loan_because: everyone has the right to create their own financial future and because we are fortunate enough to be able to give back.

lender.name: Shimi
lender.loan_because: each $25 is well spent and put to good use!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and the best way to get money to deserving folks in need.
lender.occupational_info: I serve as a contact for the public and the media for a state transportation program.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I think that helping others will help counteract some of the poverty and suffering that my present government is causing around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I create advertising to help my clients sell products to consumers. In my spare time I create art sculptures out of discarded materials. I like to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Ydramuse
lender.loan_because: We think it is not fair for the developing countries that people do not get the help they need to live in dignity. The so-called first world has a moral debt to this people.
lender.occupational_info: I am Laura and I am a linguist, I teach foreign languages, translate books and documents, work as an interpreter, etc. Santi is an IT engineer, he works with computers and software for a Spanish housing firm.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: as a family we want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family who had decided that it is important to be more involved in our own children's education. As parents, we want to instill a sense of helping others in our children.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.occupation: Mother of a Peace Corps Volunteer

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this is a way that I can join my modest resources with that of others and make a tangible difference to a very real person.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very large hospital and help take care of people who need heart surgery or other procedures related to their heart.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better about myself and helps others - that's a powerful combination!
lender.occupational_info: I travel to places like the Philippines and India to train people to handle business calls from North Americans.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: Now, I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning to design and build buildings that will hopefully make the world a better place.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: it's so easy to help someone who really needs it. When you think about how just a small amount of money can literally turn someone's life around, I can't imagine *not* wanting to do it!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run a preK-12th grade public school district in a rural area.

lender.name: Steve, Kindie, and Annie
lender.loan_because: We believe that micro-financing and direct person-to-person links have the potential to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software and consult with businesses and government agencies.

lender.name: Ian, Ellen and Heather
lender.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Ian works for a chain of furniture stores; Ellen works in a school library; and Heather is a high school student.

lender.name: stephen Landau
lender.loan_because: I like to see people have a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: Maryann
lender.loan_because: I've long wished for one-to-one charitable giving opportunities. This is a personalized and sustainable way to improve living conditions for one good soul at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am the editor of a magazine published by an organization that develops quality standards.

lender.name: St. Paul
lender.loan_because: My confirmation class is committed to supporting people in need. We also take seriously the Millenium Development Goals, #1, The eradication of Extreme Poverty, #3, Gender equalization, and #5, Maternal health. Jesus tells us to feed the hungry, tend the sick, and give to those in need. This is what we want to do.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I can and I care. It's such a small amount to me, but like thousands to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the auto industry- General Motors.

lender.name: Helge
lender.loan_because: itÂ´s important

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: As a woman and entrepreneur, I understand the difficulties that woman face in the bussiness world and would like to help encourage more woman to enter it.

lender.name: debra
lender.loan_because: to give others a helping hand with independance.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: A very fortunate woman, who presently enjoys a comfortable life on a farm, which I attained through hard work, perseverance, and a bit of luck. I would like to help others do the same, hence my participation in KIVA which I consider a great way of helping others in the 'bit of luck' department!

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: I think that if lucky people help and support other people, we will stay in a better world!

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst for a Fortune 100 corporation.

lender.name: Greer
lender.loan_because: I can change someone's life for the better

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: As a Christian, I believe I have a responsibility to help the less fortunate. Helping them help themselves...
lender.occupational_info: I manage a software development company. We develop software for banks, financial firms, large retailers, insurance companies, etc.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I'm passionately interested in establishing connections across the globe, and in helping people one-to-one instead of through big and inefficient organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I sing beautiful music. It is hard work, but it is so rewarding. I am lucky to have a job that is so thrilling.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It is a means to help others who are working to help themselves, their families and communities. I have been fortunate in my life and this is my small attempt to "pay it forward".

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Cressant
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to help people.

lender.name: Timothy Bell
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Chris
lender.whereabouts: Little Weighton East Riding of Yorkshire

lender.name: BroderWriter
lender.loan_because: as Susan Werner says in her song "Help Somebody" on the Album, The Gospel Truth, "When you've got enough to give away, [that's] the only way to live." And "I got a roof over my head; what do I do?" The call and response ends with Werner saying, "I go out and help somebody get a roof over their head, too."
lender.occupational_info: Nonfiction writer, food writer, foodie, poet, mother of an eight-year-old, and volunteer,

lender.name: Della
lender.loan_because: I own a small business and I know how important a loan can be. I also loan because it's important to help, that's what it's all about, helping...

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: i can and i care
lender.occupational_info: i own a small grocery store in chicago. we sell organic and natural foods.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I search for market needs and develop products that I can sell to hungry markets, preferrably over the Internet

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I read the Kristof article about Kiva in the New York Times and thought it sounded neat-- and it really is!

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: it is my small way of saving the world.
lender.occupational_info: Energy Efficiency Consultant

lender.name: Rene
lender.occupational_info: cancer research

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupation: Stay at home Mom to 3 boys and community volunteer
lender.loan_because: I know that the very best way to "feel good" is to help others. Giving brings rewards like nothing else I have ever experienced. Kiva has made it possible to feel as if I am helping those about whom I would otherwise never even be able to know, never mind reach in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I love being a stay at home Mom to my three boys, ages 11, 9 and 20 months. And I love being out in the community and at my children's school doing a wide variety of wolunteer work.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Getting beyond the sightseeing and making connections with local people enhances any travel experience. Lending to local entrepreneurs and learning something about their business seems to be a good way for travelers to connect and give something back to the communities they visit. I hope to meet a few of the people in Sliven while I'm in Bulgaria next month.

lender.name: The Conn Family
lender.loan_because: We are a Roman Catholic family who believes in social justice in action. We hear lots of talk about securing the borders in this country to prevent "illegal aliens" from coming in. We feel that the best way to do that is to help persons in Mexico provide for themselves and their families so they won't need to leave their families behind seeking employment in other lands. We feel that people in the richest country in the world should take action to help people in poorer countries.
lender.occupational_info: Our husband/father works at a local university. Our wife/mother is a full-time mother caring for our home and children.

lender.name: George
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher at a Los Angeles (California, USA) public high school and cover mainly technical fields: programming (C++, JAVA), digital imaging, and game design.

lender.name: Nickolas
lender.loan_because: We have so much in the United States that we take for granted. When I step back and look, I see that the rest of the world is much different. Kiva is one of the many small things we can do to help.
lender.occupational_info: Some day I hope to be able to travel around the whole world for a year. I will probably just head East or West and not stop until I get back home again.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives in a way that's dignified and self sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: I fix problems in large scale computer networks.

lender.name: Louis and Lorna
lender.loan_because: we like the idea of helping out at grassroot level and think that, through kiva, impact is delivered to where it is most needed quickest.
lender.occupational_info: your average jane and joe.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: You reap what you sow
lender.occupational_info: I support the process of moving clothing around the world

lender.name: jennifer & Jason
lender.loan_because: To improve population health we need to reduce poverty, poverty is poison.

lender.name: Richard & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Encouraging entrepreneurship around the world to ensure a better life for those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Investments

lender.name: Carol & David Grant
lender.loan_because: Microcredit has been proven to be a far more effective way to deal with the problems of third world poverty than government handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners and entrepreneurs to protect their assets and save on taxes. I hope that some of them will invest some of those savings through organizations like Kiva.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed for what I have and want to try and help others fulfill their dreams

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is the right thing to do. So many people look at the problems in the World which are often overwhelming and say what can I do. It is heart warming to know that the great and small can help to change another life for the better. Every one that can should help. There but for the grace of God go I.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help make life better for others
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, dealing with collecting money from others and paying company obligations

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: This extension of the mini-loan concept is a great idea. Good luck to all.

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: To help others.

lender.name: Team Adams
lender.loan_because: The Lord our God says "Love your neighbor as yourself."

lender.name: 4bubz
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to economically disadvantaged countries and I have consistently been impressed by the will it must take to survive the hardships. The working poor in all countries are especially vulnerable, and I know that what is not much money to me will make an enormous difference when loaned in this manner.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: It's the Christian thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I assist individuals with becoming self-sufficient. I help individuals who are unemployed, underemployed find work

lender.name: dave & bev
lender.loan_because: we all need a helping hand at one time or another.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: My heart told me to.
lender.occupational_info: We live on a small farm in Oregon where we raise Jacob sheep, keep a flock of hens, and some hives of bees. And I play ukulele.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I just had to after I read about this organization. I hope I'm helping people make a permanent difference in their lives.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I used to be an antique dealer. I write fiction.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I can and because it feels nice to share my good fortune.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I admire people who work hard to improve their lives, and love the idea of offering them some help.
lender.occupational_info: I was a writer of marketing materials for Visa, the credit and debit card company.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I lend a hand because I can. It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: American Capitalist extrodonaire..

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: i am inspired by people making their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: planning the installation of small (4-120 phones) telephone systems

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I organize and plan things.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in life and it is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I run an NGO that advocates for social and economic justice.

lender.name: The Winters
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make someone else's life much better.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I search for solutions to complicated problems.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: God had shown me too much grace that not listening to Him when Christ said to love my neighbor as myself would be selfish. If I am fortunate enough to be able to go out and buy a t-shirt or a CD when I just want one, then shouldn't I be able to sacrifice those things to help others do what they need to do to make their lives more full.
lender.occupational_info: I am a music student at Florida State University. I'm also an amatuer musician and I do ministry work with teenagers.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I believe in the microloan system.
lender.occupational_info: I help people whose homes have been destroyed by catastrophe.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am where I am because people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Sales for an energy company

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: If you cast your bread cast on the waters, it comes back to you. But, even if you should never see the deed again, you will have made the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Each day I continue to try to make a difference...a life well lived is measured by the depth of our humanity.

lender.name: Kristen and Marnix
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people -- especially in a way that celebrates initiative and dignity.

lender.name: Justin
lender.occupational_info: Georgetown Law/Georgetown Public Policy Institute Class of 2011

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: it is important to take a chance on people and show them you think they can make it!

lender.name: Richard C.
lender.occupational_info:
I was an Avocado and Citrus farmer on irrigated land in Southern California.
That land, on which we worked so hard, is now planted in houses and all the Avocado trees are gone.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I want to do something good in life....I'm not rich, but I do know that I've been dealt a better hand in life than most of the people requesting loans and feel that I need to balance the universe a little bit
lender.occupational_info: I work for in Logistics supplying materials to build telephone related equipment or supplies....I basically keep watch over inventory and forecast upcoming usages for certain materials

lender.name: Mattie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a decent standard of living and want to help others who desire the same and are willing to take a risk.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher and currently have a massage therapy practice. I plan to travel more and will go to Thailand next year to volunteer teach English in an elementary school.

lender.name: Etienne
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because:
I was lucky to be born into a particular family, country, society, and time-period where hard work can earn a comfortable living.
I loan to help those who aren't quite as lucky.

lender.name: Vigfus
lender.occupation: Musichian and I work at a printers
lender.loan_because: The industrial nations have used and abused the third world long enough. Time for change.
lender.occupational_info: I get printed items to my end of the factory where I do the finishing, pack it up and ship it out.

lender.name: chrislaurelsierrakayla
lender.loan_because: c'mon people, we can do this!

lender.name: Arianne
lender.loan_because: The KIVA organisation offers me a unique, positive and very easy way to support others.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.whereabouts: US Air Force Europe HQ Ramstein Air Base
lender.loan_because: after teaching physics and computer literacy in Jinja, Uganda, the need to financially leverage SME's became more apparent. This is one way I can get more involved and educated. I hope to find an NGO in a developing area to work with Summer 09 before starting an MBA program Fall 09.
lender.occupational_info: I lead airmen and mentor cross-disciplinary teams in the intelligence field to support strategic planning for the USAF Europe headquarters.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: I initially read about this in the New York Times, and I thought it was an awesome idea. I also read "Blue Like Jazz" by Don Miller, and was inspired to start tithing. I'm not a member of any church, so my tithing goes almost entirely to Kiva entrepreneurs! Once my loans are repaid, I donate the money back to Kiva for the good work they do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Oregon. I study politics, and am a very staunch supporter of Barack Obama!

lender.name: girish
lender.loan_because:
I want to help maximum people become Conscious and successful Entrepreneurs effortlessly.
I understand someone who is at such poverty levels has to be lifted up before they can liberate their true potential as a human.
I admire, appreciate these fellow beings who are doing something on their own. Very few of highly educated people have the courage to become an entrepreneur and keep struggling in a job.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently connecting with others to start making my vision a reality.
I want to help make maximum people Conscious - loving, realising our ONEness and liberate their entrepreneurial spirit (which i believe everyone has) for the freedom, progress & abundance of self & society.
Please check my profile (website) for further details about me.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Microcredit via Kiva is a potentially massive strategy than could actually better the condition of billions. Reliance on charitable and philanthropic enterprises alone has not achieved this. Grass roots enablement can.
lender.occupational_info: During the 1960s I founded Renewal Magazine and wrote extensively on civil rights . church renewal and international development. I later worked for UNICEF and edited UNDP's CHOICES -- sadly defunct now. I want to change the world with words. Individuals can do it on the Web. Motivated individuals rule. Together with proper values, individuals can prevail over principalities and powers.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: microcredits are sustainable, fair and efficient

lender.name: Barack Oblogger
lender.loan_because: I wish to support people in achieving their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: We support President Barack Obama for re-election and wish to spread a message of hope and self-determination across the globe. "Yes We Can!"

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Englsih at a university in Tokyo, Japan.

lender.name: Marco Bombardi
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in people who take ethical action to better their lives.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Life is too short.
lender.occupational_info: We make and install drapery, shades and blinds.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: there was alway someone there for me, and this is a great idea to help others.

lender.name: STEPHANIE
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in the world and particulary women because I thing women are the future as their children education
lender.occupational_info: i take care of children and i try to treat them. my job is fascinating

lender.name: Willa
lender.loan_because: I am learning about helping people who are not as lucky as we are.
lender.occupational_info: My mom helps people who have been arrested and are in jail.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because:
The surest way to build peace and prosperity in this world is to encourage individual enterprise, ownership, and autonomy; in short, we need capitalism. Hand outs typically only create dependency and de facto slavery. Loans respect and foster wealth creation, and as "hand ups" that respect and preserve the autonomy of the enterprising individual who receives them, they foster freedom.
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." -- Chinese proverb
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner, an investor in various equity and debt markets, I trade currencies, and I am a licensed pest management professional. I also occasionally teach philosophy courses at the community college/university level.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design computers and computer software.

lender.name: Dale C.
lender.loan_because: We can't depend on our leaders to find our way out of the myriad of problems this world faces. After all, they're the ones that got us here. We can only save the world by organizing at the personal level, all together, or at least as many of us together as truly believe in the ideals of liberty and justice for all.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a library in an engineering company, and assist my engineers in inventing new technologies which I hope will help the world find solutions to its many problems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: This is a way to connect with and help others. It is also good for me in many, many ways.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher. Currently, I volunteer with the Juvenile Courts in our county.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am new to Kiva, I received a gift certificate from my wife. I then checked out the web site and organization. I had no idea any thing like this existed. I plan to add more to my account and hope to make additional loans.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a small utility company that provides natural gas and electricity to about 40,000 customers. My department consists of a small group of men and we do electric line construction and maintenance.
I live in the northeastern part of the U.S., where weather can make my job quite interesting. There are times we will get storms that knock out the power and we will work around the clock for days, with little breaks, to restore power.

lender.name: David M.
lender.loan_because: By combining a little seed capital with faith and opportunity the world becomes more friendly and closer to purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I own a collection agency based out of Atlanta Georgia. We help firms collect delinquent accounts in the medical, consumer and commercial markets.

lender.name: Lynelle
lender.loan_because: A small action on my part can make a big difference for someone else. I like the direct connection that Kiva and its partners provide.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect people from environmental pollution.

lender.name: Gertrude
lender.loan_because: it is a way to repay those who helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage team processes so that large groups of people doing different jobs can work together to build new software and hardware support systems for our company, which delivers time-sensitive packages to over 220 countries and territories worldwide.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I believe in market discipline and in integrating the world by providing open access to credit, markets, and knowledge. Micro-finance seems to be a powerful way to boost development, and this is the first approach I have seen that allows small lenders to become involved.

lender.name: Ryan and Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I love this idea and wish that I had though of it while volunteering in Ecuador.
lender.occupational_info: I work to promote renewable energy and energy efficiency programs and policies

lender.name: Muhammad Imran
lender.loan_because: I want to make GSM Mobile Franchise (Telecommunication). I hav done Master in Information Technology. I need 65000 us$
lender.occupational_info: This is related to Telecommunication, and its Mobile Franchise

lender.name: Jos
lender.occupational_info: providing music to the theatre

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: i care
lender.occupational_info: even though i am on disabilaty i am rich compared to these people

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: we are a global community and I believe an individual can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell supplies for use in restaurants - like frying pans, spatulas, containers. My customers are global.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: We need more Big Heart globally!
lender.occupational_info: embrace more, understand more.

lender.name: KivaKids
lender.loan_because: Helping people live better makes us better off too.
lender.occupational_info: We are three sisters who are still in school in Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I struggled for years trying to support my family and I know how rough it can be. I now have more than I need and would like to help those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: It's an affordable way for someone like me with a small income to make an impact.

lender.name: Oz
lender.loan_because: a small helping hand can make a large difference.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Non-Profit Org. Exec. & Mother to 4 great people
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: Non profit Insurance (believe it or not)

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: this is a good constructive way to help

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have been given much and loaned to often.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to do public health work for the US government.

lender.name: Kalin
lender.loan_because: I don't live to work. I don't work to live. I live and work to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Development department at a non-profit organization. My work revolves around raising funding. We work with abused and neglect children ages 0-5 years old.

lender.name: Anabel
lender.loan_because: everybody in this wealthy, privileged country is morally obligated to help, in whatever ways they can.
lender.occupational_info: wife, mother, daughter, sister, artist, gardener, cook, cleaner, manager - probably in that order...

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I belive I should do it
lender.occupational_info: I hope I am like a friend who gives a help in an inportant moment making a small amount of money brings hope and courage to never give up believing life is worth living

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to assist others achieve prosperity in their own countries.

lender.name: Castro-Koll Family
lender.loan_because: I see the future prosperity of the world when supporting those who are impoverished. It gives them a chance to live enthusiastically and positively influence their communities, which will in turn postively influence mine.

lender.name: Jeff & Brigitte
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: Brigitte teaches French language & culture, Jeff teaches French language, early modern French literature & European Studies

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I like to help make good things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems for libraries.

lender.name: Ryn
lender.loan_because: my mom got me started on it.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: Although there are problems here in the United States, I think that there are other places in the world who deserve our attention. I like the KIVA concept because every little bit helps!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying so that I may be a scholar in the area of comparative, or international, criminology: The study of crime across countries and how criminal behavior differs between countries.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I support retail buyers and planners with the systems and reports they use to make buying and planning decisions.

lender.name: khaled
lender.loan_because: As a Muslim and as a person, it is my obligation to help those in need. Microfinancing is the perfect outlet for this.
lender.occupational_info: I manange the development of web-based applications for a large oil company.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: this seems to be the best way any individual can have immediate impact to help others lift themselves up
lender.occupational_info: I help make computers do something for our business that is needed.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help.

lender.name: Treesje
lender.loan_because: trade is universal and brings people together. Shops and marketstalls have social-economic importance.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in child protection schemes with the governementand am specialised in child developmentdisorders

lender.name: Rana
lender.loan_because: I am
lender.occupational_info: I fix things

lender.name: Sue and Stuart
lender.loan_because: Trade is a way to peace and equality

lender.name: Ollen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are striving to help themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer chip maker where I am responsible for high-purity metal deposition processes.

lender.name: Ingrid and Michel
lender.loan_because: We are very lucky to live in Holland and enjoy a healthy and good life. We love helping others.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: That's what brothers and sisters do -- give each other a boost once in a while.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve business problems with computer software solutions.

lender.name: Craig and Cindy
lender.loan_because: We loan just because.
lender.occupational_info: Craig is a student pursuing a Doctorate in Policy Studies hoping to work for organizations like KIVA. Cindy is an engineer in the production of airplanes.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
I believe this is a much better idea than just giving a donation or handout. In my experience as a doctor, the patients that take a more active role in their care generally are healthier, happier, and have a much better quality of life. The same principal applies here. The obligation to pay back what you have borrowed helps a person develop responsibility and become independent.
I also love that many of the businesses on Kiva's site are owned by women. I hope that this will help give women in other countries the same opportunities that are possible in the United States.
lender.occupational_info: A doctor!! What else to say.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a job and I was previously a business owner. I understand first hand how difficult it can be to obtain funds from the traditional banking system.I want to help someone who is interested in helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with engineers and designers to develop software applications that streamline the engineering, design and manufacturing process for new products and ideas.

lender.name: Maurice
lender.loan_because: We all need to help where we can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small biotechnology company in the US.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Microlending seems like the most direct way to help others build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work to clean up environmental pollution in rivers and harbors.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I want to make a better future for everyone.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a little better day to day.
lender.occupational_info: I do server/desktop computer support for a steelmaking company.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. I have "taken" much from countries I have traveled in and this is a way to give back.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: A little help is better than a lot of pity - especially when helping those who try their best to help themselves. Everyone should have at least the CHANCE to succeed in life.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupation: I work at Honda as a writer

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: What a great way to have an impact in this world. A great form of charity because the money you supply keeps giving and giving! That's a incredible concept that works.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales for my main job with a starting hobby in urban agriculture.

lender.name: Campbell and Catie
lender.loan_because: It is important to share with others in our good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: We are responsible to learn and go to school. Learning to share with others is our most important lesson.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
lender.occupational_info: I design industrial electrical controls.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I can. And if you can, you should too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in public safety for the City of Houston.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jane & Andrew
lender.occupational_info: Jane's working on her MFA in painting and Andrew's studying towards a doctorate in primatology, both in New Orleans.

lender.name: Chanquest
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lender.name: Veronica Hoffman
lender.loan_because: I can :)
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small correctional facility where I teach men the virtues of treating women with the respect and adoration they deserve.

lender.name: Danton
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with health and enough money to be happy, though I'm certainly not wealthy. I feel an obligation to help others when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English (writing and reading) to 7th and 8th grade students in a small, rural school.
